name: test_e2e_with_logs[061_XSS_BYPASS_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XSS_BYPASS_002` |
| **Name** | Mixed case script tag bypass |
| **Category** | XSS |
| **Subcategory** | filter_bypass |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<SCRiPT>alert('XSS')</SCRiPT>`
- **Encoded**: `%3CSCRiPT%3Ealert%28%27XSS%27%29%3C%2FSCRiPT%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~28000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:59:49.000 UTC
